_header: This ender night / I heard a wight
_description: ‘Alas I dye for payne’, Christ’s complaint — one six-line tail-rhyme stanza

BLRoyApp58.Transcription:
Thys yenders nyghtI herd A wyghtmost heuynly complayneAnd
                    euer a mongthys was hys sang A las I dye for payneA las I dye for
                    payne
BLRoyApp58.Editions:
Flügel,  Ewald. 
             “Liedersammlungen des XVI Jahrhunderts, Besonders aus der Zeit Heinrichs
                VIII.” 
             Anglia
         12 (1889): 225-72, 585-97: 265.
